job.title: Sr.Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
1)*Job Title : Sr.Site Reliability Engineer
*Total relevant experience : 7 + years
*Job Location : Remote
**Please NOTE: We have positions open in CANADA and US both **
Job description:

- 7-9 yrs Total IT experience.
- Experience of at least 4-5 years within an Enterprise SRE configuration.(Mandatory)
AWS: 4 years (Mandatory)- AWS Cost Optimization, Developing applications in an AWS environment & Terraform.
- Debugging production issues: 4+ years (Mandatory).
- Python: 2-3 years (Mandatory)-DJango, Celery.
-Good to have: AWS Certified.
- Experience in with development technology stack-Docker, Python, Django, Celery, Postgres. AWS serverless technologies(Lambda, Cognito, API Gateway, Step Functions, AppSync), - -Experience in operational technology stack(Uwsgi, Nginx, RabbitMQ, Elasticsearch, Redis). Experience with automation tools- Salt, Vagrant, Packer. Experience with metrics and orchestration tools-Jenkins, NewRelic, Datadog, Loggly.

-He/ She needs to be the best buddy of Key IT Stakeholders and sponsors.
-Healthcare Industry exposure is a plus.
